properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
S/V L' ALBATROS, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, REPORTS
CREWMAN WITH HEART CONDITION IN 12-58N 048-31W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE REQUESTED TO ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 59 659 670 9292,
FAX: 59 659 663 2450.
